name: Dawn of E'gh
description:
The apocalypse is here and it is your job to save the world. BUT you are only a simple farmer and all you know how to do is take care of your animals.

Protect eggs until they hatch and let your animals take care of the monsters around you.

But beware: if the monsters get a hold of your egg, it will hatch into a twisted creature and join the enemies' ranks.

Note: Not all features are in-game at this point.
